abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description: Tidehunter summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing its movement speed and armor for a short duration.
abilities.notes: With Aghanim's Scepter, becomes a cone-shaped AoE spell that can hit multiple enemies.

abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.description: Provides damage block against physical attacks, and removes negative buffs when enough damage has accumulated.
abilities.notes: Blocks damage from physical attacks and periodically dispels debuffs when damage threshold is reached.

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor, damaging nearby enemies and reducing their attack damage for a duration.
abilities.notes: Reduces the base damage of affected enemies by a percentage. Does not affect bonus damage.

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in a radius around Tidehunter, damaging and stunning all enemies caught within it.
abilities.notes: The tentacles expand outward from Tidehunter at a speed of 775 units per second.
